sentences.sentence: But today, unsanctioned tinkerers have more power than ever.
sentences.translation: 但是如今，未被许可的产品补修匠比以往都要有更多的权利。

sentences.sentence: It found that many of its workers had unsanctioned servers under their desks.
sentences.translation: 它发现，许多员工的办公桌下面摆着未经批准的服务器。

sentences.sentence: His friends and neighbors say that in his 23 years of unsanctioned service, he has never been more appreciated.
sentences.translation: 他的朋友和邻居说在他23年的未经许可的服务中，他几乎没得到过多少赞赏。
